text:
Hey guys we've got some really cool Pearlized
edition toy blind bags from Care Bears.

On the back we have Friend Bear, Grumpy Bear,
Hopeful heart bear, Wish Bear, Best Friend

Bear, Bedtime Bear, Harmony Bear, Birthday
Bear, and Cheer Bear.

And one really rare one, the work of Heart
bear, which I really hope we get this time.

Now these have been sold out in all the stores
around here.
I'm so glad that we got some today.

We made a movie about these Pearlized care
bears, so if you haven't seen it, you should
check it out.
Let's see what we've got for our first one.
It is Wish Bear.

And you see they've got the little Pearlized
sheen.
They're really shiny, so they're Super Cute.
I love these Care Bears.
And the next blind bag.

It is Friend Bear with two little yellow flowers
and a light orange.

Very cute, I love how shiny these Care Bears
are.
Now these series 3, like I said they're pearlized.

The last series, series 2 they were glitter
so they had glitter inside of them.
I'm not sure which one I like best.

I think I like the pearl just a little bit
better.
It's Birthday Bear!

Birthday Bear is a real similar color to Friend
Bear, but you can see it's got a little Birthday
cupcake and one candle on it.
Very cute.
Another Wish Bear, we have twin Wish Bears.

I wonder how rare that Work of Heart Bear
is.
I haven't even seen it.
I wonder what it looks like.
It's Best Friend Bear!

A little lavender color here, a star and heart
rainbow on the tummy.

If you look real closely on their paws they
have little hearts.
They have heart pads on their hands.
I'll put her together with her plush pal.
It's a pink one, is it Cheer Bear?
Oh it's the Hopeful heart Bear.

A heart like a sun almost with little colorful
rays going off in every which way.
Super cute.

I their little cheeks you can almost pinch
them.

I don't think Hopeful Heart bear has been
in any of the other blind bag series, at least
not in series 2.
So that's a new one for this blind bag series.
A blue color...
It's bed time bear!
I like bedtime bear.
A few more blind bags to go.

Can't really tell what's inside 'cause they
all feel the same.
Harmony Bear!

I think Harmony Bear is one of my favorite
Care Bears, 'cause she always sings.
Adds a melody to everything.

A slightly different purple than this one,
a little more metallic almost.
Alright I think we've got two more blind bags.

I'm hoping for maybe a Grumpy Bear or that
rare Work of Heart Bear.
I don't know if we can be that lucky though.
It's another Hopeful Heart Bear.
With the Heart.
I like this one.
Alright last Care Bear guys.
And it's Wish Bear!
We got three Wish Bears.

Here's all the cute little Care Bears we got
this time.
We got a bunch of different ones.
There's still a bunch more to collect.

I really like these pearlized blind bags,
they're really shiny and cute.

Still need Cheer Bear and Grumpy Bear and
the work of, work of Heart bear.

Alright guys, give us a like and check out
our other toy videos.
Bye! =)
